biotools.summary:
The genetic and pharmacogenomic landscape of snoRNAs in human cancer.

G enetic and p harmacogenomic landscape of sno RNAs in cancer.

GPSno systematically investigated the impact of genetic variants and pharmacogenomics landscape of snoRNAs in multiple cancer types by using thousands of data from The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA).
